name: First Adventure (Old Pup Studios)
description:
My first project with GB studio. Used to learn the basics and get familiar with the tools. 

The music and sprites (minus the main character) were pulled from online repositories. 

Shoutout to:
Mr. V- Soundtrack files
Gamebow Games- Sprites
Moshuo- Sprites

Will probably keep this up-to-date as I try new things as a way to look back on progress.
Looking forward to getting some full games built up and put out!
